references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Enrique Pérez Herrero, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
S. M. Losanitsch, Die Isomerie-Arten bei den Homologen der Paraffin-Reihe, Chem. Ber. 30 (1897), 1917-1926.
mathematica: A005997[n_] := 1 + Floor[(n-1)/2] + 2*(Binomial[n+1,3] -Binomial[Floor[(n+1)/2],3] - Binomial[Ceiling[(n+1)/2],3]); A005999[n_] := A005997[n] - (n-1)^2; Array[A005999, 100] (* _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Apr 22 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [1+Floor((n-1)/2)+2*(Binomial(n+1,3)-Binomial(Floor((n+1)/2),3)-Binomial(Ceiling((n+1)/2),3))-(n-1)^2 : n in [1..50]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 16 2014(PARI) Vec( (x^5+2*x^4+x^3+x^2+1)/(-1+x)^2/(-1+x^2)^2 + O(x^66) ) \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 16 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
